name: Banana Republic Chairs 1-1
description: This work is based on a intervened monoprint or monotype. It shows elements of a landscape such as outdoor furniture, concrete blocks pattern, a banana tree silhouette in gradient. To emphasise its provenance we are presented with Banana Republic text. This is art from the lockdown, the result of artist adapting to lockdown restrictions & limitations as a worming artist and a mother. https://www.renatafernandez.com//blog
